name: Dynamite Deka EX: Asian Dynamite
description: Asian Dynamite is an Arcade-only sequel to Dynamite Deka 2. While using the former's engine and sound effects, this game sticks closer to the original Dynamite Deka game having players rescue the President's kidnapped daughter. The main difference between Asian Dynamite and Dynamite Deka 2 are the new graphics, different characters and a redesigned power-up system that has players pick up suitcases and transform their characters into 3 different personas with their own fighting styles.
